description: Fail an organization invoices batch invoice.
permissions: User must be an admin or be authorized to update the related organization invoices batch (OrganizationInvoicesBatchInvoiceFailurePolicy#create?).
side_effects: Changes the organization invoices batch invoice status to failed and records a failure action.
validation_notes: --organization-invoices-batch-invoice is required. The referenced organization invoices batch invoice must exist and its previous status must be successful in order to transition to failed.
